mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reply (reply_content, nickName, board_id, reply_password, user_id) VALUES (#{replyContent}, #{nickName}, #{boardId}, #{replyPassword}, #{userId})
mapper.select: SELECT reply_id, user_id, nickName, reply_content, reply_created_at, reply_updated_at FROM reply WHERE board_id = #{boardId} ORDER BY reply_created_at DESC LIMIT #{p.pageStart}, #{p.amount}
select board_id, reply_password FROM reply WHERE reply_id = #{replyId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SubReply (sub_reply_content, nickName, reply_id, sub_reply_password, user_id) VALUES (#{subReplyContent}, #{nickName}, #{replyId}, #{subReplyPassword}, #{userId})
mapper.select: SELECT sub_reply_id, user_id, reply_id, nickName, sub_reply_content, sub_reply_created_at, sub_reply_updated_at FROM SubReply WHERE reply_id = #{replyId} ORDER BY sub_reply_created_at DESC
select reply_id, sub_reply_password FROM SubReply WHERE sub_reply_id = #{subReplyId}
